statements: SELECT * FROM space_mission_media WHERE mission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, media_type FROM space_mission_media WHERE capture_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_id FROM space_mission_media WHERE media_type = 'image' ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT capture_timestamp FROM space_mission_media WHERE mission_id = '8a90dc2d-a75e-4520-9aa7-d70937e8fca2' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM space_mission_media WHERE media_type = 'video' AND capture_timestamp < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY mission_id ASC;
SELECT id, media_type, capture_timestamp FROM space_mission_media WHERE mission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT media_type, capture_timestamp, mission_id FROM space_mission_media WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT media_type, capture_timestamp FROM space_mission_media WHERE mission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND capture_timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM space_mission_media WHERE capture_timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY capture_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, media_type, media_content FROM space_mission_media WHERE mission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM space_mission_images;
SELECT mission_name, capture_date FROM space_mission_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, mission_name, capture_date FROM space_mission_images ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM space_mission_videos WHERE duration > '1 hour';
SELECT video_id, mission_name, duration FROM space_mission_videos WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, mission_name, capture_date FROM space_mission_images WHERE mission_name = 'Mars Rover'
SELECT mission_name, image_data FROM space_mission_images WHERE capture_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mission_name DESC
SELECT * FROM space_mission_videos WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT mission_name, COUNT(*) AS image_count FROM space_mission_images GROUP BY mission_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT mission_name FROM space_mission_videos ORDER BY mission_name
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_url, mission_id FROM Images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM Missions WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Videos ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, video_duration FROM Videos WHERE mission_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE id = 1
SELECT image_url, mission_id FROM Images ORDER BY image_timestamp DESC
SELECT id, mission_id, DATE_FORMAT(image_timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_timestamp FROM Images WHERE mission_id = 2
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, mission_description FROM Missions WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT mission_name, COUNT(*) AS video_count FROM Missions LEFT JOIN Videos ON Missions.id = Videos.mission_id GROUP BY mission_name HAVING video_count > 0
SELECT image_name, capture_date FROM Images;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM Missions WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT image_name, capture_date, mission_id FROM Images WHERE capture_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT video_id, video_name, capture_date FROM Videos WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE capture_date > '2021-01-01' AND mission_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, capture_date FROM Images WHERE mission_id = 2 ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM Missions WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT video_name, capture_date FROM Videos WHERE capture_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT file_name, capture_date FROM videos WHERE duration_minutes > 60;
SELECT astronauts.astronaut_name, astronauts.nationality, missions.mission_name FROM astronauts JOIN missions ON astronauts.astronaut_id = missions.mission_id;
SELECT file_name, capture_date FROM videos ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT spacecraft_name, launch_date FROM spacecraft WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE capture_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT file_name, capture_date FROM videos WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM missions WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality FROM astronauts ORDER BY nationality, astronaut_name;
SELECT spacecraft_name, launch_date FROM spacecraft WHERE mission_id IN (SELECT mission_id FROM missions WHERE mission_name LIKE 'Apollo%') ORDER BY launch_date ASC;
